es.selectCategoryDescription1: Here you will find a selection of sample tokens categorized into different groups. Choose a category from the dropdown menu to display the matching tokens. The free module includes 20 tokens per category:
es.selectCategoryDescription2: The tokens themselves are located in the Foundry VTT directory structure at:
es.selectCategoryDescription3: From there, you can choose from 120 tokens for your characters, NPCs, and other game content.
